description: Simplified Claude Code hooks - no fancy names, just tools

PreToolUse.command: bash -c 'agents=$(echo "$CLAUDE_INPUT" | grep -o "subagent_type" | wc -l); if [ $agents -lt 3 ]; then echo "⚠️ Need at least 3 agents for development tasks" >&2; exit 2; fi'

PostToolUse.command: echo '📝 Files modified. Run tests before committing.' >&2
